description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3bt47","text":"Sterol-based detergents, like digitonin more effectively disrupt membranes with sterols, like those of eukaryotes. This protocol leverages the different membrane compositions of eukaryotes and bacteria to preferentially lyses the eukaryotic membranes of the choanoflagellate species, S. rosetta, from a co-culture with bacteria. The lysis buffer includes RNase inhibitors to preserve RNAs for RNA purification or cDNA synthesis, and the included protease inhibitors make this protocol suitable for protein extractions for western blots.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":284,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"etr49","text":"Determine the total number of cells in the culture that will be harvested using a hemocytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5u2lv","text":"Fix 200 µl of cells with 2 µl of 37% formaldeyde and vortex well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11pas","text":"Pipet up and down to homogenize cells, and pipet 12 µl of cells into the chamber of a hemocytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62qac","text":"Count the number of cells ( ) in the four corner quandrants of a Neubauer, bright-line hemocytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dolup","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"N","guid":"9BC24EE0D14611EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bl55a","text":"Calculate the cell concentration ( cells/ml) according to this equation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fc5c9","text":"     cells/ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"mnn9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"[Cells]","guid":"ADC02C70D14611EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}},"1":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"[Cells]=N/4 • 10000","guid":"77C6E1E0D14611EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7icr4","text":"Determine the volume of the culture ( ) and then calculate the total number of cells in the culture ( ) according to this equation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3pb4j","text":"      cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"51o1v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"Vol","guid":"55DE80F0D14711EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}},"1":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"Total","guid":"310DE9A0D14711EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}},"2":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"Total=[cells]•Vol","guid":"6315D5C0D14711EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1imdk","text":"Calculate the volume of lysis buffer (  µl) to add to the cells for lysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"40giv","text":"  µl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7dvbk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f5r9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"LysisBuffer","guid":"A6D82DD0D14711EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}},"1":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"LysisBuffer=Total/100000","guid":"D56A2D10D14711EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hpi6","text":"Centrifuge the cells in 50 ml conical tubes at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"2400","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"guid":"54B85E2AD14811EAA4F20A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ljks","text":"Gently remove supernatant with a serological pipette, leaving a small amount of liquid of the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnv45","text":"Gently remove the remaining supernatant with a fine-tip transfer pipet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3q6rb","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet ( ) in the calculated volume of   (  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3aauo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3352A65EA0F111EEBB4A02C0B41BC903","step_guid":"43D93ABE2BB94FC29DBDBCD02608C216","title":""}},"1":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"LysisBuffer","guid":"BB013350D14811EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":0}},"2":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3352A6DEA0F111EEBB4A02C0B41BC903","step_guid":"709CAFBD4DDC49CF86DBD10CD57490DA","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bgdo","text":"Pipet the cells gently up and down and then incubate   for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2u3nr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"ECEC96C0D14811EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":"45805","label":"","temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"F1DB19E0D14811EAB8AA153EBF69D757","id":"75841","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vfl2","text":"Homogenize the lysate by passing 5 times through a 30G needle attached to a luer lock syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7e3a5","text":"Separate the S. rosetta lysate from the bacterial pellet by using a gel-loading tip to gently transfer the supernatant into a new tube. Pay attention not to disturb the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hhoc","text":"Flash freeze lysate in liquid nitrogen and store at -80°C for long term storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
